name: OSES (itch)
description:
OSES

Oses puts you in control of 3 survivors as they fight for their lives against zombies. Run, shoot and switch between characters to help them survive.

Game Features:

  • Character swaping mechanic: Switch between the three survivors to make sure nobody dies or runs out of ammo.
  • 3 game modes with different playstyles.
  • 15 challenging built-in maps
  • map editor, for you to build the perfect level.
  • 5 different weapons that change the way you play and allow for amazing combinations.
  • character customization, with many colors and hats to choose from, create the survivor you want.

The game offers 3 game modes, each one with a different playstyle:

  • Classic - Take all the survivors to safety,  solving simple puzzles and fighting zombies on the way.
  • Generator Defense - You need to protect two generators on the map, manage the suvivors' positions and ammunition to hold off the zombie waves.
  • Food Rush - Don't let the survivors starve to death. Collect food drops around the map to keep them alive.

Make sure to follow me on twitter to stay up to date.

If you like this game, share this page with your friends :)
